title: Transit Infrastructure Costs
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)

#Borrowed from TidyTuesday instructions
transit_cost <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2021/2021-01-05/transit_cost.csv')

country_total <- transit_cost |>
  group_by(country) |>
  filter(country == "US" |
         country == "CN" |
         country == "BR" |
         country == "FR" |
         country == "AE") |>
  summarize(cost_km_millions = mean(cost_km_millions))

ggplot(country_total, aes(x = country, y = cost_km_millions, fill = country)) +
  geom_col() +
    labs(
    title = "Transit Infrastructure Project Costs by Country",
    x = "Country Code",
    y = "Cost Per KM in Millions of USD"
  ) +
  
  #Centered format
  theme(legend.position = "none")









Data is courtesy of the TidyTuesday via the Transit Costs Project:

title: Fox Kloske
text: Hi! Welcome to Fox’s first website—thanks for stopping by. I go to Pomona College and use he/him pronouns. You may catch me playing Spikeball, watching the Brooklyn Nets, or working on an oil painting. Say hello if you see me around!

title: United States Spending on Kids
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)

#Borrowed from TidyTuesday instructions
kids <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2020/2020-09-15/kids.csv')

national_average <- kids |>
  group_by(year, variable) |>
  
  #Isolate four categories of interest
  filter(variable == "lib" |
         variable == "PK12ed" |
         variable == "Medicaid_CHIP" |
         variable == "parkrec") |>
  summarize(inf_adj_perchild = mean(inf_adj_perchild))

ggplot(national_average, aes(x = year, y = inf_adj_perchild)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = variable)) +
  facet_wrap(~ variable) +
  labs(
    title = "National Spending on Children by Year (Inflation Adjusted)",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Spending Per Child (Inflation Adjusted $)"
  ) +
  
  #Centered format
  theme(legend.position = "none")









Data is courtesy of the TidyTuesday via the Urban Institute:
